::Stratus::

Stratus backs up, firing two more pods at Slaughter as the bot tried to get out of the first two.

"Megatron, I've caught one of the intruders. He's immobolized for the moment," Stratus says over the comm to Megatron, preparing two more pods to fire.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Slaughter::
> 
>         Slaughter was about to grab Stratus by the neck with his right
> pincir, when the organic pods hit him and Slaughter then found himself
> tangled in vines.
> 
>         "RR!" Slaughter groaned.
> 
>         The vines kept Slaughter's pincirs clamped so he couldn't open them.
> Slaughter struggled to rip the vines or eat them or something.
> 
>         "Get me out of these....VINES!" Slaughter demanded.
